cover_props.comment2: an FX market that allows unrestricted trading even on weekends.
cover_props.comment3: Enjoy more flexible risk hedging and continuous investment opportunities on our platform

product_props.title: 24/7 FX Market with Unmatched Usability
product_props.comment1: Through blockchain technology, we enable 24/7 trading.
product_props.comment2: We maintain the familiar UI/UX for easy use, so you can start investing immediately.

1.title: Trade 24/7
1.comment: In traditional FX trading, you couldn't trade on weekends even if important events occurred. Afin Technologies opens up weekend FX trading, offering more flexible risk hedging and increased trading opportunities.

2.title: Ease of Use
2.comment: We've incorporated the familiar UI/UX of MT4/MT5, and other major exchanges, making it easy for users a smooth transition from other trading platforms. Of course, various technical indicators are available for use.

3.title: Flexible API Access
3.comment: Most FX exchanges impose restrictions on algorithmic trading with APIs. Our platform allows unrestricted REST API use without limitations on trading volume.

team_props.title: Our Management Team
team_props.comment: All team members are highly experienced in government and technology industries.

Ko.title: CEO
Ko.description: Ko is a former diplomat with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Japan. Before establishing his own company, Shangri-la Inc., Ko served for four years at MOFA headquarters in Tokyo and at the Japanese Embassy in China. He is also a self-taught full-stack developer with over four years of professional experience in machine learning and blockchain. He speaks Japanese, Korean, Chinese, and English.

Woojin.title: CTO
Woojin.description: Blockchain specialist with over 10 years of professional experience in the field. After leaving the faculty of physics at Hanyang University in Seoul, South Korea, Woojin began his career as a technology specialist. He has held the position of CTO three times at various startups, including two prominent blockchain companies in South Korea.
